fi.protonode.reloadingkeystore

Class ReloadingKeyStore.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.KeyStore.Builder
      • fi.protonode.reloadingkeystore.ReloadingKeyStore.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ReloadingKeyStore

    public static class ReloadingKeyStore.Builder
extends java.security.KeyStore.Builder
    KeyStore.Builder creates reloading keystores for various types of credential files.

      • fromKeyStoreFile

        public static java.security.KeyStore.Builder fromKeyStoreFile(java.lang.String type,
                                                              java.nio.file.Path path,
                                                              java.lang.String password)
                                                       throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                              java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                                              java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                                              java.io.IOException
        Creates KeyStore builder for given PKCS#12 or JKS file.
        Parameters:
        type - KeyStore type such as "PKCS12" or "JKS".
        path - Path to the keystore file.
        password - Password used to decrypt the KeyStore.
        Returns:
        The KeyStore builder.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateException
        java.security.KeyStoreException
        java.io.IOException

      • fromKeyStoreFile

        public static java.security.KeyStore.Builder fromKeyStoreFile(java.lang.String type,
                                                              java.nio.file.Path path,
                                                              java.lang.String password,
                                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,char[]> aliasPasswords)
                                                       throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                              java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                                              java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                                              java.io.IOException
        Creates KeyStore builder for given PKCS#12 or JKS file.
        Parameters:
        type - KeyStore type such as "PKCS12" or "JKS".
        path - Path to the keystore file.
        password - Password used to decrypt the KeyStore.
        aliasPasswords - Passwords used to decrypt keystore entries. Map of: alias (key), password (value).
        Returns:
        The KeyStore builder.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateException
        java.security.KeyStoreException
        java.io.IOException

      • fromPem

        public static java.security.KeyStore.Builder fromPem(java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> certs,
                                                     java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> keys)
                                              throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                     java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                                                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                     java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                                     java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
        Creates KeyStore builder for given certificate and private key files. Certificate in position certs[n] must match the private key in position keys[n].
        Parameters:
        certs - List of paths to certificates.
        keys - List of keys to private keys.
        Returns:
        The KeyStore builder.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.security.KeyStoreException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        java.io.IOException
